org.robocup_logistics.llsf_encryption

Class KeyConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.robocup_logistics.llsf_encryption.KeyConverter

  • public class KeyConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class converts the encryption key given as a String into a key that can be used by the algorithm. Besides it creates the first initialization vector.
